Title: Icebreaker
Writer: Brian Koppelman (created by), David Levien (created by), Andrew Ross Sorkin (created by), Adam R. Perlman, Willie Reale, Alice O'Neill (story editor), Randall Green (story editor), Wes Taylor (story editor)
Actors: Paul Giamatti, Damian Lewis, Maggie Siff, Malin Akerman
Plot: Axe makes a bold play to secure capital from a controversial source. Taylor chafes against Axe's recent moves. Chuck recruits the allies he needs to move forward with a new plan. Connerty seeks out a career opportunity.
